RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduação em Engenharia Mecânica pela Escola de Engenharia de São Carlos (1983); Especialista em Mecânica Fina (mecatrônica) pelo Centro de Mecânica Fina da EESC-USP (1984); Mestrado em Ciência Espacial/Mecânica Orbital pelo Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais (1989) e Doutorado em Engenharia e Tecnologia Espaciais pelo Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais (1997). É tecnologista do Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais. Tem experiência em Engenharia Mecatrônica, com ênfase em Projetos eletro-óptico-mecânicos, atuando principalmente na área de Sistemas de Controle de Atitude e Órbita, Tribologia e Mecanismos Espaciais, nos temas que abrangem mas não se restrigem a: controle, sistemas dinâmicos, motores elétricos em geral (motores de passo), modelagem, sensores em geral (sensores de horizonte), elementos de máquinas (mancais de rolamento e deslizamento) e atuadores para satélites (rodas de reação). Professor do Curso de Mestrado e Doutorado em Engenharia e Tecnologia Espaciais e Controle do INPE
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: I am graduate in Mechanical Engineering by the San Carlos School of Engineering (1983); Specialist in Fine Mechanics (Mechatronics) by the Center for Fine Mechanics of the EESC-USP (1984); Master degree in Space Science / Orbital Mechanics by the National Institute for Space Research ( 1989) and Ph.D. in Engineering and Space Technology by the National Institute for Space Research (1997). I am a Technologist of the National Institute for Space Research and Professor of Civil Society for Education Braz Cubas (UBC-Braz Cubas University). I have experience in Mechatronics Engineering, with emphasis on electro-optical-mechanical mechanisms, working mainly in the attitude and Orbit Control Systems in the topics coverage but not restrict to: control, dynamic systems, electric motors in general (step motors), modeling, sensors in general (horizon sensors) and actuators (reaction wheels).

PESQUISA-E-DESENVOLVIMENTO.NOME-ORGAO: Coordenação Geral de Engenharia e Tecnologia Espacial
PESQUISA-E-DESENVOLVIMENTO.NOME-UNIDADE: Divisão de Mecânica Espacial e Controle

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVOS-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Estudo de superfícies em contato em abiente espacial com o intuito de obter sistemas de lubrificação para mecanismos espaciais.
Estudar fenômenos não-lineares em geral e em particular aqueles presentes no movimento de atitude de satélites artificiais.
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVOS-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA-INGLES: To study nonlinear phenomena in general and in particular those related with attitude motion of artificial satellites.

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-2.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Dinâmica dos Corpos Rígidos, Elásticos e Plásticos

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVOS-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Análise, Projeto, Fabricação e Testes de Mecanismos (Sensores, Atuadores e equipamentos de testes) para Controle de Atitude de Satélites. Trabalhos estão sendo desenvolvidos no campo da análise de mancais de rolamentos: tipos, geometria, carregamento individual de esferas e rolos, tensões e deformações de contato; distribuição de cargas entre elementos rolantes, análise cinemática, lubrificação elastohidrodinâmica, estatística sobre durabilidade, vida à fadiga, atrito e influência de ajustes e da temperatura sobre o atrito e a durabilidade de mancais de rolamento; cálculo de atrito levando em conta ajuste e diferanças térmicas entre os anéis.
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVOS-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA-INGLES: Analysis, Design, Manufacture and Testing of mechanisms (sensors, actuators and test equipment) for Attitude Control of Satellites. Jobs are being developed in the field of analysis of rolling element bearings: types, geometry, individual loading of balls and rollers, stress and deformation, loads distribution between rolling elemements, kinematic analysis, elastohydrodynamics lubrication, statistics on durability, the fatigue life, and the influence of fits and temperature on the friction and durability of rolling bearings; computation of friction taking into account adjustment (fits) and thermal differences between the rings.

PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-UNIDADE: Divisão de Mecânica Espacial e Controle

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Minimização de Vibrações Estruturais Induzidas por Atuadores
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Vibrações induzidas por atuadores devem ser minimizadas quando tarefas sensíveis à vibrações são realizadas em satélites artificiais. Esse projeto visa, inicialmente, minimizar vibrações nas câmeras de observação da Terra, induzidas por mecanismos de acionamento de painéis solares e, futuramente, por mecanismos rodas de reação. Esse projeto de desenvolvimento de mitigação de vibrações não introduz hardware adicional e está sendo pensado para ser aplicado nos satélites da missão CBERS e PMM (Amazônia, Mapsar) do INPE.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Vibrations induced by actuators must be minimized when tasks sensitive to vibrations must be made in artificial satellites. This project aims to, initially, minimize vibrations in the Earth observation cameras, induced by Bearing and Power Transfer Assembly Mechanisms and, in future, by reaction wheels mechanisms. This project development and mitigation of vibration does not introduce additional hardware and is thought to be implemented in the mission CBERS satellites and PAM (Amazonia, Mapsar) INPE.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Minimização de Vibrações Estruturais Induzidas por Atuadores

PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-UNIDADE: Divisão de Mecânica Espacial e Controle

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Análise, Projeto e Desenvolvimento de uma Roda de Reação para Aplicação em satélites
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Rodas de reação são mecanismos importantes de Sistemas de Controle de Órbita e Atitude de satélites. Com esse projeto pretende-se desenvolver as partes mecânicas e elétricas de uma roda de reação. Futuramente, pretende-se desenvolver uma roda de reação que utiliza mancais magnéticos.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Reaction wheels are important mechanisms for Attitude and Orbit Control Systems. Initially the aims of these project is to develop the electrical and mechanical parts of a reaction wheel. In the future, we intend to develop a reaction wheel that uses magnetic bearings.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Analysis, Design and Development of a Reaction Wheel for Application in satellites

PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-UNIDADE: Divisão de Mecânica Espacial e Controle

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Cálculo de Atrito em Mancais de Rolamento
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Atuadores para sistemas de controle de atitude que utilizam o princípio da troca de momento angular utilizam volantes que se apoiam em mancais de rolamento ou magnéticos. Para quantificar a perda de energia devido ao atrito e aquecimento para qualquer condição operacional, num ambiente cuja fonte energética é limitada, é primordial a análise minuciosa das forças estáticas e dinâmicas e dos fenômenos geradores da perda envolvidos no elemento de máquina. lsso levará a produtos mais confiáveis e com maior durabilidade em ambientes severos. Essa pesquisa beneficia todo setor de máquinas e equipamentos uma vez que colabora para o desenvolvimento e fabricação de máquinas mais econômicas, diminuindo o impacto no meio ambiente.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Cálculo de Atrito em Mancais de Rolamento

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This work introduces a new, rapidly convergent, numerical method for internal loading distribution calculation in statically loaded single-row angular-contact ball bearings subjected to a known eccentric thrust load, which is applied to a variable distance (lever arm or eccentricity) from the geometric bearing centerline. Numerical results for a 218 angular-contact ball bearing have been compared with those from the literature and show significant differences in the magnitudes of the maximum ball load and extend of the loading zone.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: Expressões para Cálculo de Forças e Torques sobre as Esferas de um Rolamento de Contato Angular
DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO-INGLES: Expressions for calculation of forces and torques on the balls of a Angular Contact Ball Bearing

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Faculdade de Tecnologia São Francisco - Jacareí

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Bearings are machine elements that serve to transmit forces and torques between two structures, while allowing rotational freedom about an axis. The bearing is generally constituted of an outer ring, an inner ring and rolling elements which are interposed between the two rings in order to reduce friction. There are many types of bearings. In this work, the interest is focused on a specific type of bearing, which is the angular contact ball bearing with single row ball. It develops in the sphere contact / track pressure areas resulting from the elastic deformation between the parts in contact. These areas are fairly curved, due to the contact geometry, generating shallow landslides on most points of contact. These landslides generate frictional forces on the sphere which are in equilibrium with the reactions of the slopes and the inertial forces due to the movement of the ball. The aim of this study is to survey the expressions of forces and moments acting on a ball bearing angular contact ball a career . In order to obtain a method for determining the movement of the ball and the sliding friction torque of the bearing , due to inertia and the forces generated in the areas of slides interfacial contact forces

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: Expressões para Cálculo de Forças e Torques sobre as Esferas de um Rolamento de Contato Angular
DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO-INGLES: Expressions for calculation of forces and torques on the balls of a Angular Contact Ball Bearing

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Faculdade de Tecnologia São Francisco - Jacareí

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: CONTROLADOR AUTOMÁTICO DE PH

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Sociedade Mant. de Extensão Desenv. Tec. São Francisco Ltda.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This work presents a prototype of a pH controller using the Arduíno microprocessor for use in swimming pools, aquariums, tanks, surface treatments or other application that is necessary to control the pH of water or any other liquid. The prototype consists of the following parts: a pH sensor, a board microcontroller, two metering pumps, an LCD display, containers for chemicals, tanks for product placement and arrangements for interconnection and operation of the equipment. With the prototype is possible to measure the pH and determine the required amount of chemical to be added to the mix to correct the pH of the liquid in which the sensor is inserted in accordance with the parameters set by the user. Also shown is the method of McAvoy et alli (1972) for the pH dynamic equations in a reaction tank under continuous stirring. It is examined in detail a specific example of neutralization of sodium hydroxide with acetic acid. Experimental results confirm the accuracy of the model.

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Sociedade Mant. de Extensão Desenv. Tec. São Francisco Ltda.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: ANÁLISE DE VIBRAÇÕES DE VENTILADORES INDUSTRIAIS

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Sociedade Mant. de Extensão Desenv. Tec. São Francisco Ltda.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This work deals with a vibration and temperature data collection system study of a motor-fan assembly, which is used in the quenching process of automotive glass process. The system uses specific devices to capture data, real-time visualization, data analysis and reporting. The work describes the system in operation and explains how to make the data collection and analysis of vibrations; i. e., the purpose of this work is to explain the operation principle of a vibration analysis system. This method is able to predict the wear of the set shaft-bearing, preventing unforeseen downtime due to equipment wear.

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Sociedade Mant. de Extensão Desenv. Tec. São Francisco Ltda.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This work discusses the study and development of a prototype amplifier for human?s electrical signals, in order to understand the process of capture electrical signals from the muscles. For this it was developed a research on the characteristics of the signal being measured and their methods of capture, as well as the analysis of a bionic arm system.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: Sistema de Controle de Temperatura de Água Regenerativo

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Sociedade Mant. de Extensão Desenv. Tec. São Francisco Ltda.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: On our planet, every day growing concern two important situations: - The economy and ecology, one linked to another, such concern is the fact that the more one saves natural assets; most conserves the environment, thus making every day, more sustainable planet. It is based on this aspect we decided to develop this project that brings the idea to save electricity in our country means less wetlands for operation of hydroelectric power plants , fuels burned in power plants , nuclear power plants etc. ... This is a Regenerative Water Temperature Control System that basically uses an electrical system parts already known, which has a simple electric shower, plumbing, valves, a block of copper and brass used to perform heat exchange power sensors, temperature sensors, power, water and a controller board called Arduíno to make the control system. It Works with the water that enters the system through the pipe block heat exchange, experiencing temperature sensors that send the value to the Arduíno. The temperature will be pre-determined by the user of the system, starting control as the data is collected and Heat Exchanger becomes effective, providing energy savings.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: Sistema de Controle de Temperatura em um Processo Industrial
DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO-INGLES: Temperature Control System in an Industrial Process

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Sociedade Mant. de Extensão Desenv. Tec. São Francisco Ltda.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper addresses the study of a system of temperature control in a prototype industrial plant for the preparation of a solution. System variables are pre-determined amount of diluent, the dosage amount of the solute and the temperature of the solution. The prototype consists of a container in which the sensors and control actuators will be installed, which are: input solvent valve, heater, metering pump solute, temperature sensor, level sensor and mixer. The process sequence consists of the following steps: a solvent input to a predetermined volume, solution dosage, mix of the solution and heating to a desired temperature it is controlled by a PID (Proportional, Integral and Derivative) system.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: Braço Robótico com 3 Graus de Liberdade com Comunicação sem Fio
DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO-INGLES: Three Degrees of Freedom Robotic Arm with Wireless Communication

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Sociedade Mant. de Extensão Desenv. Tec. São Francisco Ltda.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This work consists of construction of a robotic arm and control software for use in teaching courses in engineering and robotics. If produced scale may be used in operation in industrial production lines. The system consists of an articulated robotic arm with three degrees of freedom, with revolute joints, direct drive servo motors, an articulated claw and a program in C language for easy implementation. For future work the user can control the arm via an application on the mobile using a Bluetooth adapter. The approach used in designing the software will be developed from the concept of cinematic movement.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO-INGLES: STUDY OF DIGITAL REDESIGN METHODS APPLIED TO THE GAS GENERATOR SUBSYSTEM CONTROL OF A TURBOSHAFT ENGINE

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Sociedade Mant. de Extensão Desenv. Tec. São Francisco Ltda.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This work reviews the digital redesign methods of control systems. Time systems that are continuous and discrete part of, from the viewpoint of continuous systems were analyzed. We reviewed various construction techniques for discrete equivalent continuous functions in time, so that the design methods for continuous systems can be used as a basis for the design of discrete systems. The techniques described were used in the design of a gas turbine engine and showed that work well. Stages of the project were presented as well as simulation results for the control subsystem of a gas generator turbo engine propelled.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: ESTUDO DE MÉTODOS DE REPROJETO DIGITAL APLICADOS AO SUBSISTEMA DE CONTROLE DO GERADOR DE GÁS DE UM MOTOR TURBO PROPULSADO
DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO-INGLES: STUDY OF DIGITAL REDESIGN METHODS APPLIED TO THE GAS GENERATOR SUBSYSTEM CONTROL OF A TURBOSHAFT ENGINE

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: CINEMÁTICA DIRETA E INVERSA DE MANIPULADORES ROBÓTICOS
DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO-INGLES: DIRECT AND INVERSE KINEMATICS OF ROBOTIC MANIPULATORS

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Sociedade Mant. de Extensão Desenv. Tec. São Francisco Ltda.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The basis for any advanced control of robot manipulators is a relationship between the Cartesian coordinates of the end-effector (manipulator device which interacts with the environment) and the coordinates of the joints of the manipulator. In cinematic terms a manipulator consists of links and joints. This work is reviewed a direct allocation method of coordinate systems of the links, to obtain the position of the end-effector and the Jacobian (matrix of partial derivatives of the equations of the manipulator with respect to the coordinates of the joints) matrix. Techniques for obtaining the solution of these equations for kinematically simple manipulators, which includes all commercially available manipulators are presented. Finally we get the inverse Jacobian matrix from the solution.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: Plataforma Distribuidora Circular

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Sociedade Mant. de Extensão Desenv. Tec. São Francisco Ltda.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: A platform is to be made which consists of a dispensing system which identifies pieces of different dimensions, positions them and directs them to different predetermined addresses. The platform has a system of mechanized transport consisting of a conveyor fed from a tubular magazine pieces. The track is driven by a DC motor that transports the parts to the point of identification, which is performed by sensors. After the step of identifying the parts are directed to the distributor, who receives an order given by the control, to direct them to the address or predetermined position
